name: photobooth
description: A Photobooth webinterface for Raspberry Pi and Windows

scripts.build: npm-run-all --serial format build:faq build:gulp build:head clean:skipwelcome
scripts.build:faq: mdown --input 'faq/*.md' --output manual --header faq/header.php --footer faq/footer.html && mv manual/faq.html manual/faq.php
scripts.build:head: git log --format='%h %s' -n 20 > HEAD
scripts.clean:css: rm resources/css/*.css || echo 'resources/css/*.css can not be removed or no .css files exist!'
scripts.clean:faq: rm manual/faq.php || echo 'faq.php can not be removed or does not exist!'
scripts.clean:head: rm HEAD || echo 'HEAD can not be removed or file not exist!'
scripts.clean:js: rm resources/js/*.js || echo 'resources/js/*.js can not be removed or no .js files exist!'
scripts.clean:node: rm -rf node_modules/ || echo 'node_modules/ can not be removed or does not exist!'
scripts.clean:skipwelcome: rm .skip_welcome || echo '.skip_welcome can not be removed or does not exist!'

author: Andreas Blaesius <andi@unlegacy-android.org>
